title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Competency Development for Data-Driven Storytelling Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Represent information using at least three visualization techniques (bar, line, pie charts) with industry datasets
Independently perform data cleaning and analysis processes using industry-standard software (e.g., Google Sheets) with at least 80% accuracy
Write a 3-minute storytelling script incorporating data insights and derive improvement suggestions through peer review

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
